column5: As the title says, I finally caught my first carp of the year tonight.      I may be giving up
Wow.....other than minnows, thats the smallest carp i have ever seen Dan. Is that why you're giving up?
What kind of carp is that Dan ??? Sure its small but like the mirror carp its one of those types you don't catch a lot of...
I think it's just a baby common carp, it was an inch and a half long. There had to be 50 or so around so i have hope for the future.
Man that is small...Its going to take about ten years before its a real good size so you may have to go find another spot for now bud....
It's one of those brown, "feeder goldfish" from Ruffins  Dan, come out here anytime I'm sure we can muster you something much larger with ease. haha
Come on, Dan...he's a cute little "fella".
